Issue.creator: maniankara
Issue.summary: Channel update tutorial - Remove hardcoding channel name in-between
Issue.description: anchor_update_in_envelope.json {code} should be: {code} echo '{"payload":{"header":{"channel_header":{"channel_id":"'$CHANNEL_NAME'", "type":2}},"data":{"config_update":'$(cat anchor_update.json)'}}}' | jq . > anchor_update_in_envelope.json {code} instead. Note the single quote ending and beginning before after the CHANNEL_NAME variable. This looks like a silly typo, but when working with different channel names this can be a pain. >
